descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]***NEW***
[/size]I've got all the permissions to make a stand-alone follower but it's harder than I tought and she never comes out as the preset, so if someone knows how to do it please write me , I'd love to have some help. TY

*Work in Progress*[/b][i]I'm thinking about making her as a new follower or a replacement for Elisif[/i]


I'm not good at taking screenshots (as you can see) so be welcome to post yours!

So this is a preset for RaceMenu of Cersei from GameOfThrones
[b]Nord [/b]and [b]Imperial[/b] races work fine. Haven't tried myself the elven races yet

[i]Download Manually[/i]
Skyrim Folder
Skse
Plugins
Chargen
Preset
Place her there ! :)

[i]NMM MO[/i]
Simply download her, the load order doesn't really matter

[b][u]REQUIREMENTS
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]  (optional [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?]RaceMenu PrecacheKiller[/url] )

[i]Recommended mods (also if you want her to look EXACTLY like mine)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiHair[/url][/i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]Eyes of Aber[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Texture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SevenBase[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]LightFace[/url]  (really useful if you don't use a ENB)
Dress used in screenshots [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39922/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D39922&pUp=1]Elven Dress
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]


Please put a link of my mod if you're going to use her in some videos or pictures (I'm also going to add them to this page)
Don't upload her anywhere else thanks
Download and enjoy playing as Cersei! :)

CREDITS
ApachiiHair
Eyes of Aber
SG Texture
SevenBase
LightFace 
RaceMenu
SKSE
ElvenDress (for screenshots)
ImmersiveHUD
DynamicVision
RLO
ClimatesOfTamriel
Brows
author: GrayPortrait
